11421112212.content:
"Okay sweetums, get up and I'll change your diaper" Maya said sweetly.

"I don' wanna" Riley pouted, pulling her bed cover back over her face.

"Honey come on, we're gonna be late for school, you don't wanna miss out on school with your best friend Maya right?"

"Ehhhhh"

"Okay then". Maya took a few steps back, then charged towards Riley and pulled the blankets off of her.

"Maya!" Riley squealed as she recoiled back into a ball of warmth.
Maya peek at Riley's yellow backside. She pressed her hand against it and some pee squenched through, soaking her already damp sheets.

"Riles, you NEED a change girl. This room stinks and I'm pretty sure it was fine when I left last night."

Riley slowly opened one eye to face the blonde girl calmy smiling at her.

With a humph from her voice she bounced herself onto her back and spread her legs out around Maya.

"That's my girl."

Maya walked over to the diaper girl's drawers and picked out a fresh diaper as well as some supplies. She turned around to see Riley with her hand in her diaper, pushing on the insides of the soaked fabric.

Maya shook her head and pulled Riley's hands back above her head. Her t-shirt rode up exposing her tummy. Maya gave her a raspberry causing Riley to explode with laughter and squeal. After a bit, Maya let her go and undid the taping on Riley's diaper, exposing her private parts completely.

Everything that was exposed was still drenched in pee and if that wasn't enough, the stench of overnight urine flooded the whole room.

"God, Riley! What did you drink last night?" Maya exclaimed.

Riley just giggled at her friends reaction.

Maya wiped over her friend's private parts, sometimes glancing over at Riley who was off in her own head.

"Riley I need you to lift your behind."

Riley tried to lift her back but lacked the strength. She grunted until her face turned dark red but she just collapsed back onto the bed. Maya tried to keep herself from cracking up as she could see a bead of sweat drip down Riley's forehead. Maya sighed, then lifted her friend's legs onto her shoulders, much to the surprise of Riley who was now red from embarrassment rather than exhaustion.

Finally, after some effort, Maya taped the fresh diaper was put onto a now very happy Riley.

Riley jumped out of bed getting ready to run downstairs for some breakfast. She had just opened the door when Maya interrupted her.

"Aren't you forgetting someting, sweetums?" she asked.

Riley skipped back and squatted to level height with Maya who was still sitting on her bed. "Thanks mommy," she said, just before she gave her a peck on Maya's lips.

Maya smirked at her best friend who was now crashing through the door.

"I wonder if she realises she still has no pants on?"

"Wait. Hotel? Roommates? I didn't know this trip was," he swallowed, "overnight."

Lucas nodded, trying to remember what exactly those special permission slips had looked like. Almost in an instant Auggie wakes up. He could sleep through almost anything but if you mentioned that there was something he liked, such as his favorite show or pancakes, he was up in a flash. 15113.content:
Cory and Topanga had to have a long conversation about the whole situation. One of the top things they kept being told by schools was that a student must be potty trained entering kindergarten. Why would their child be any different? They both realized that schools were not equipped to have a child not potty trained. Sure, the odd accident will happen here and there, but a child who will have multiple accidents a day or need some sort of protection was not going to work.

After the kids went to bed, Cory and Topanga discussed for a while the different possibilities.

"I just don't know what we are going to do with Auggie," Topanga began, "he just will not train. Riley may have bed wet, but she was trained during the day by 4."

"What options do we have?" Corey questioned. "He has to go to school."

"Does he?" Questioned Topanga. "Kindergarten is not a requirement. I know plenty of parents who keep their kids out of school until First Grade."

Corey had never thought of that. Do they actually need to send Auggie to kindergarten? To panga had worked with him all along and he was already reading, could write his name, and knew his numbers.

"I can tell you though," Topanga snapped Corey out of his own mind, "he will need to go to daycare, because I have to get back to my law practice."

To panga had given up working when Auggie was born. Financially, they were doing fine, but being alone with only a small child can be daunting. Corey fully understood her need to go back to work and wouldn't question it. They could even find a place on Riley's way home from school so she could pick him up.

"It's settled then," Corey stated, "Until he is ready, we will send him to daycare. Maybe get him into half year kinder in the spring."

Over the next several weeks, Topanga and Corey sought out the perfect place for Auggie. With each daycare, they explained the situation. Most were understanding, but explained that their 4-5 room was not equipped for diaper changes. Due to limited staff, Auggie would have to be placed in the 3-4 room to ensure they had the facilities to handle any changes that needed to be made. Additionally, most day cares explained that he needed to go a full month at home with minimal accidents before he could start wearing Pull Ups and working on potty training at school. Again, in most cases they just didn't have the staff to handle chasing a child around to make sure he didn't need to go potty.

At last, they settled on a daycare center about 4 blocks from their house. This site agreed that he could do some of the activities with the 5 year olds (1 hour in the morning for math activities and 1 in the afternoon for reading), but would still do playtime, nap, lunch, snack, etc with the 3-4 room. Corey could drop him off on his way into work in the mornings and Riley could pick him up on the way home from school. Riley was eager for this situation. Although she was not looking forward to having to change her brother's diapers, she had been trying to find a way to earn a little money and show her parent's she was responsible.

The first day of school came around and Auggie was up and eager to go. As usual, his diaper was wet and messy from the night before and Topanga changed him and then helped him dress in his new outfit for school.

"Where's my backpack?" Auggie asked excitedly.

"Buddy, your dad and I have something to share with you," Topanga began. "We know that you are 5 years old now, but you aren't ready to go to kindergarten yet."

Auggie looked downtrodden at that statement and ready to cry. "I'm not going to school?"

"You will be going to a daycare center where we can continue to work on your potty training. This will give you time and if you are ready to go by January, then we can enroll you in kindergarten. There will be lots of fun new things to do."

Although he didn't seem happy, it was time to go, so Auggie was strapped into his booster seat while Corey, Topanga, and Riley all piled in the car to drop him off. Normally, Riley would walk, but she had to meet the daycare staff for pickup in the afternoon.

After dropping him off, they went their separate ways. Meanwhile, Auggie had a decision to make.

15533211.content:
Things appeared to be going great for Joshua Matthews. He had been excepted into the college of his dreams NYU. Joshua with happy to be continuing his studies and was proud all his hard work paid off.

However once he moved into to his dorm he started wetting the bed. At first Joshua This was a one time accident but he started to wet the bed every night. Joshua knew he had his bed wetting from his roommates or he would harassment and bullied endlessly.

Unfortunately it didn't take long for his______ to find out.
15533211.title: He wets the bed

155332111.content:
It didn't take long for Joshua's RA to notice that every morning at 7:00am Joshua charged out of his room carrying wet sheets.

The RA decided to ___________.
155332111.title: His RA

1553321111.content:
Believe it or not, the NYU handbook had a detailed section regarding potty training and wetting the bed. Apparently, it was part of an anti-liability plan for the school. Joshua’s RA knew that bedwetting was grounds for immediate expulsion. The RA didn’t want to get Joshua expelled but at the same time, If he did not do anything he would lose his job as an RA and risk being expelled himself. After a lot of thinking the RA decided to call Joshua’s emergency contact, his brother Corey Matthews with the hope that they can work out a solution.

Corey put down the phone after his conversation with Joshua’s RA he could not believe what he was hearing. Joshua had always been so responsible and determined and now he was wetting the bed in college. When Corey agreed to be Joshua’s emergency contact it was because his parents thought it would be better for him to do it since he lived close to NYU. However now things had changed both of Corey and Joshua’s parents were old and their health quickly declining. Corey knew that he cannot take this problem to his sick parents he would have to handle it himself.

Corey decides to invite Joshua out to lunch hoping that it would soften the blow he was about to give him. The first half of the lunch was pretty normal until Corey interrupted their conversation and said “I talked to your RA and I know you have been wetting the bed for a while now” Joshua was speechless that his brother knew about his little problem. Corey continued “I do not know if you know this but all students are required to be potty trained at NYU or they can be dismissed as a student” Joshua then interjected “I am potty trained you know” which cause Corey to respond by saying “you have been wetting to bed every night for almost a month now” Joshua just blushed too embarrassed to respond. Corey continued “I have decided that you are going to move out of your dorm and in with me to prevent you from being expelled from school. There is just one thing if you move in with me you have to wear Pull-Ups to bed every night at least until you get the bed wetting under control“ Joshua could not believe what he was hearing he was a college freshman and his brother was going to force him to wear Pull-Ups. At first, Joshua was going to deny his brother’s offer but he thought about it and he could not let everything he worked for fall apart so he begrudgingly accepted. Before he moved into the Matthews’ apartment did have one more crucial question “do we have to tell Riley and Auggie about the Pull-Ups”
1553321111.title: Call his emergency contact

15533211112.content:
“No, we do not tell Riley and Auggie this can be a secret between brothers. After hearing that Josh agreed to move in with his brother

Time Skip

Joshua was incredibly embarrassed about his situation but with only his brother knowing about the Pull-Ups it minimized his humiliation.

One Saturday his aunt Topanga decided that the Matthews family with going to go on a picnic in Central Park. Joshua really was not interested in going but his older brother made him go. The family set up a picnic blanket in the field surrounded by other families doing the same thing. The picnic with pretty uneventful until Auggie said: “look, Joshua, wet himself”. Joshua looked down to where Auggie was pointing to see his now wet jeans. He could not believe it he had never had accident during the daytime before now. Unfortunately, Augie had a loud voice that carried through field so all the other picnickers are were staring at the college freshman who had wet his pants. Joshua, Lucas and Charlie eventually manage to escape but Joshua and Lucas had lost their pants and had to walk back home in their diapers. Charlie was also a mess from his accident.
15533211112122222212111.title: Charlie Is bullied by the kids

155332111121222222121111.content: The boys finally returned to the apartment and once Mr. Matthews saw their sorry state he took immediate action. Cory charged over to the group and grabbed the leashes to Joshua and Lucas harness and grabbed onto Charlie’s ear. He then swiftly dragged the boys into the nursery. First Cory handled Joshua and Lucas by changing their diapers and then giving them pacifiers to keep them quiet. After he was finished he turned towards Charlie who was standing in the corner of the room staring at the wet spot on his pants. Cory once again grabbed his ear and pulled him over to the changing table. He then proceeded to strip Charlie of his clothes and change him into a diaper. Charlie had attempted to struggle and resisted which was something Joshua and Lucas never tried. Charlie felt he was different from the other boys because he did not have a history of accidents and did not think this situation was fair. Eventually Cory had managed to get Charlie into the diaper and put him back in a makeshift crib made from various furniture from the nursery. Cory then said “I am very disappointed in you Charlie. I am going to have to call your parents and tell them that I think you should join our diaper buddy club”. Charlie did not cry like Lucas but his head did hang low with the knowledge that his parents deeply respected Mr. Matthews and that they would almost certainly follow his teacher’s suggestion to put him back in diapers.

info.brief_description: Riley, Maya, and the rest are entering 7th grade, but some of them may have a secret.
info.description:
Riley, Maya, and the rest of the gang are entering 7th grade, but one or more of them might have a secret. That secret is that some or all of them need to wear diapers, pullups, goodnites, etc.

Who needs to wear what is up to you guys, have fun and remember this story starts out when they were in 7th grade (Season 1).

I do not own rights to Girl Meets World or its characters, this is just a fanfiction.
